sigh

2002-11-14

as
planned, the thesis is now rendering. whew. i didn't think about it until
today, but suddenly all of my tuesdays and thursdays are going to be stress-
and class-free. i have gotten quite sick of this project, so I won't be too
dismayed when it is all done. i'm sad about being sick of it, because it
is my creation... basically i wish i had designed the project a little differently.
but hey, look on the bright side... uh...

damn, not a very good night for bright sides
